name: gotta marry that clown
description:
Gonna Marry That Clown is a short (very short) time management/dating sim where you must fight against fate. It takes place in an idealistic world where everybody gets enough sleep, you have productive weekends, and you constantly run the risk of falling in love with a clown.

Today may be the most important day of your life.

This game uses the font Abaddon.

Sounds used: [1] [2] [3] [4]

Originally made for GMTK Game Jam 2020, ultimately submitted to GMTK Deadline Missers Jam.
